H0.text: In February 1938, Roberto M. Ortiz became President of which South American country. Argentina

H1.text: In February 1938, Roberto M. Ortiz became President of which South American country. Chile

H2.text: In February 1938, Roberto M. Ortiz became President of which South American country. Uruguay

H3.text: In February 1938, Roberto M. Ortiz became President of which South American country. Argie

A4.text: Jaime Gerardo Roberto Marcelino María Ortiz (24 September 1886 – 15 July 1942) was President of Argentina from 1938 until his resignation in 1942.

A5.text: He became president in 1938 following the 1937 presidential election, described as being among the most fraudulent in Argentine history.
